backend/lib/Notification.mo: Defines notification types and a Notification record with fields for user, message, timestamp, and read status.
backend/lib/Statistics.mo: Defines statistics record types including monthly counts and phone status breakdowns.
backend/main.mo: Main backend actor managing phones, users, reports, notifications, invites, and PINs with access control and various data structures.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features addressed, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend source files and their responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color variables and theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Application HTML entry point with PWA meta tags and root mounting element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, access gating, loading screens, and layout selection.
frontend/src/components/ImeiHistoryTimel: Component rendering IMEI event history with icons, labels, timestamps, and loading state.
frontend/src/components/InviteGate.tsx: UI for entering and redeeming invite codes, including URL code detection and backend redemption with query invalidation.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSwitcher: Dropdown button allowing users to switch between Indonesian and English.
frontend/src/components/MainLayout.tsx: Main app container managing navigation tabs, admin access, and notification popups.
frontend/src/components/NotificationPopu: Auto-dismissing popup that displays a notification with icon, title, message, and optional IMEI.
frontend/src/components/PinSettingsDialo: Dialog for setting or changing a 4‑digit security PIN with validation and backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Full‑screen modal prompting new users to enter and save profile details.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity and invalidates related queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and auth-client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for backend calls including access state, user profiles, PIN operations, and admin actions.
frontend/src/i18n/index.ts: Custom i18n manager handling languages, resources, translation lookup, and subscription updates.
frontend/src/i18n/locales/en.json: English translation resource file containing UI strings for the app.
frontend/src/i18n/locales/id.json: Indonesian translation resource file containing UI strings for the app.
frontend/src/i18n/useTranslation.ts: Hook providing reactive translation access and language switching via the custom i18n system.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining light/dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Displays an about page with translated content explaining the app’s purpose and blockchain-backed benefits.
frontend/src/pages/AdminInviteManagement: Provides an admin interface to create, copy, refresh, and view invite codes with status badges.
frontend/src/pages/CheckImeiPage.tsx: Allows users to search an IMEI and view its status and history with conditional result cards.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows statistics and a list of recent theft reports with loading states and formatted timestamps.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Presents a multilingual login landing page with feature highlights and a button that triggers Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/pages/MyPhonesPage.tsx: Manages user phone list with add, release, and PIN setup workflows using multiple dialogs and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Displays user notifications with icons, timestamps, and options to mark individual or all items as read.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows user profile details, principal ID, and provides logout and PIN settings management.
frontend/src/pages/ReportFoundPage.tsx: Allows reporting a found phone by submitting its IMEI and optional finder info via a mutation.
frontend/src/pages/ReportLostPage.tsx: Lets users report a lost or stolen active phone, auto-fetching location and submitting details through a mutation.
frontend/src/pages/StatisticsPage.tsx: React page that fetches and displays statistics with loading skeletons, error UI, and charts.
frontend/src/utils/releaseOwnershipError: Utility to convert release-ownership errors into clean, user-friendly messages with backend message mapping.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking error-handling features and issues related to phone ownership release flow.
